stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Spear Phishing Campaign Using "WE RECEIVED INVALID CREDETIALS FROM YOU - UPGRADE NOW" Themed Emails Containing Malicious Link
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: US-CERT was notified by a trusted third party of a spear phishing campaign using "WE RECEIVED INVALID CREDETIALS FROM YOU - UPGRADE NOW" themed emails containing a malicious link.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Title: Malicious E-mail Indicator
stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
-----BEGIN EMAIL BODY----- Dear USPER Member
We have received multiple account update notifications from you regarding the upgrade of your account security. Unfortunately we are unable to upgrade your account security because you didnt complete the process. We urge you to please complete the process for a good security to be placed on your account. Unable to do this may cause your account to be compromised by anyone with your information.
COMPLETE YOUR ACCOUNT UPGRADE NOW (SOURCE COMMENT: The text "COMPLETE YOUR ACCOUNT UPGRADE NOW" hyperlinked to http://urmcroseburg.org/administrator/templates/bluestork/js/rev.htm.)
Thank you for helping us to server you more better.
Sincerely, USPER. -----END EMAIL BODY-----

EmailMessageObj:Header.EmailMessageObj:Subject: WE RECEIVED INVALID CREDETIALS FROM YOU - UPGRADE NOW

stix:Indicator.indicator:Title: Malicious Link Indicator
stix:Indicator.indicator:Description: Link that would steal user credentials and download a file.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Title: Malicious File Indicator
stix:Indicator.indicator:Description: The file name was not provided by the trusted third party.
